## PreviousSlideComponent class

This Component can be added to an entity. When the entity is clicked, the previous slide will be shown.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PreviousSlideComponent 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(entity, slides)](./dcl-slides.previousslidecomponent._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new PreviousSlideComponent. This Component can be added to an entity. When the entity is clicked, the previous slide will be shown. |
